attributes.action: Invest in our existing train infrastructure, not HS2.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to spend heavily on the existing rail infrastructure rather than wasting billions on a faster route between Brimingham and London.

The service experienced vs the cost of travel in and around London is dreadful and needs serious money.

It's time to stop investing in ridiculous HS2 projects and start investing in better rail infrastrucutrefor the millions of people who already use our crippled system.
